info.title: ClockIn API
info.description: Web API for the ClockIn Platform

post.description:
Returned jwt token needs to be provided in the Authorization Header upon submitting a request.
Authorization Header contents schema: "Bearer TOKEN"
This api is session-less and provides no methods for logging a user out. The token is the key for all requests, so you can just throw it away to log a user out.

post.summary: Refresh an access token using a refresh token

patch.summary: Assign Employee/Manager to manager. If a relation already exists, it will be updated
You made a mistake? Ask an admin for help and buy the poor guy some chocolate!

post.summary: Hand in a sick leave request (gets approved automatically)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of vacation request to be updated

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of vacation request to be canceled

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of vacation request to be approved

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of vacation request to be declined

get.summary: Get all vacations of a user in the given year

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID of whom the vacations are

patch.summary: Update the amount of vacation days for an account

409.description: Not possible to start a new work session

post.summary: Stop the currently running work session

409.description: Not possible to stop this work session

get.summary: Get all work sessions of one employee in a given month and year
get.description: If no request body is given, this method shows work sessions of the current month

patch.summary: Update a work times of a session by a given id

delete.summary: Delete a work session by a given id

patch.summary: Update the Times in which an employee can start work
Update the Time an employee has to work per week

old_password.description: old password about to be changed

VacationInput.description: input data for creating/editing a vacation request

accountId.description: account id of user matching to this vacation dataset

VacationModel.description: Vacation model as in the database
